org.hibernate.cfg
Class Ejb3JoinColumn

java.lang.Object
  org.hibernate.cfg.Ejb3Column
      org.hibernate.cfg.Ejb3JoinColumn

public class Ejb3JoinColumn
extends Ejb3Column

Wrap state of an EJB3 @JoinColumn annotation and build the Hibernate column mapping element

Author:
Emmanuel Bernard
